data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Polly's family is very interesting. She ____ a ____ family, and ____ live ____ many ____ parts ____ the ____. It's ____ to ____ everyone, but it's nice ____ visit ____ towns. Once a year they all go on vacation together.
data.partBlankContent: Polly's family is very interesting. She h__ a la___ family, and th__ live i_ many diff_____ parts o_ the cou____. It's diff_____ to s__ everyone, but it's nice t_ visit diff_____ towns. Once a year they all go on vacation together.
data.fullContent: Polly's family is very interesting. She has a large family, and they live in many different parts of the country. It's difficult to see everyone, but it's nice to visit different towns. Once a year they all go on vacation together.
data.answer: 波利的家庭非常有趣。她有一个大家庭，他们住在这个国家的许多不同的地方。很难见到每个人，但是参观不同的城镇很好。他们每年一起去度假一次。
